description:
For those who have problem with running the app:

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:flatpak/stable
sudo apt update
sudo apt install flatpak

flatpak install flathub org.jaspstats.JASP

This is a very nice complement to frequentist tools such as SPSS and so on. It even offers a nice choice of classical tools in addition to the Bayesian stats. The most recent version even comes with machine learning algorithms. Highly recommended!
Keep "Installing" after 2 hour. I'm using Ubuntu version 19.10. I hope it fixed.
Installing doesn't work on Ubuntu 19.04 - same as comment above, "Installing" doesn't even start
summary: Doesn't work on Ubuntu 19.04 - for now

description:
Very good software with lots of capabilities. Really nice and easy point and click interface. All of the basic analyses are there. Reminds me of early Minitab.
Installation was very easy through flatpak. Version 0.11.1 added machine learning that is the trend these days.
If you're a student or grad it's more than enough for your statistics assignments and you don't have to pay a single dime.
summary: Very good software with plenty of analyses and tests

description: I've tried several times now. It appears to have installed, but when I launch it I just get weird color patterns and can't get any menus to work.

simple interface, user friendly.
detailed statistical analysis.
stylish modern looking graphs.
and even much much more.
try it yourself.
the only issue
after Linux mint 20.1 the application is not working
any idea?????
summary: every thing you need whatever the area of your research

description: Its a shame as it had a load of potential, but its rendered unreliable if its going to shut down every time I want to calculate a new variable (even if my data set has 10 pieces of data). Unfortunately I can't recomend.
summary: Shuts down every time I try to calculate a new column

description: I'm running JASP on windows and ubunt 21.10. It's an amazing programme for statistics. Much, much easier than SPSS, especially on the design side and also the ease of use.
It was perfect and I was totally recommended using this app. But this time, for not knowing why, It just not work, not even able to turn on.
